text_block_list.text:
——A mock race against a strong opponent. 
Today's opponent was much stronger than any other before.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
——Believe-san. 
Thank you for today.

text_block_list.name: Believe
text_block_list.text:
Okay……Durandal-san. But either way…… 
I'll still do this at my own pace.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(Her own pace…… I know Believe-san very well. 
Going at her own pace is the one thing that can't be underestimated)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(As a Leader, her ability to consistently win is much 
like the ability of a skilled craftsmen. Unless I 
press the attack, she won't crumble. Which means……)
choice_data_list: Durandal! Just do it like usual!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Trainer-dono……?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
You believe in me more than I do. 
In the 『Holy Sword』 that rests in these legs. ——In that case.

The "Stability" of Believe vs the "Sharpness" of Durandal. 
It was a battle to chase after an Uma Musume who was one step ahead.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(As expected, a solid start. But don't 
panic, just take position like usual.)

text_block_list.name: Believe
text_block_list.text:
There's no need for tricks. Or excessive acceleration. 
Just——increasing speed.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Kuu, this feeling of being worn down…… 
It's the toughest……

text_block_list.name: Believe
text_block_list.text:
The last straight! Alright, here! 
Haaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
——!! I must also draw my sword! 
This blade——will reach you without fail!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Roar, my 『Holy Sword』! 
Yaaaaaaaaaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Believe
text_block_list.text: Not yet!!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(——!! She still……had this much stamina left? 
Even after a lap like that……!?)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(What a way to race…… She's too strong…… If this 
continues then……she'll get away before I can catch her!)

In that moment, there was a sense of despair. 
Her face clouded at the prospect of defeat.

I wanted to disperse those clouds. 
To once again revive that spark of hope——!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(Haa!? Trainer-dono…… That's right, 
to bring victory, a knight must never lose hope)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(If my despair would only block my own path, 
then it would still be fine. However……)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(That person was not testing me. 
As a trainer, they wanted to prove themself)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(That person didn't laugh at my aspiration, 
telling me that "Dreams should be chased")

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I can't let them down. 
I can't let that happen——!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Believe-san, see if you can withstand this! 
The strength of a knight who has found their ideal lord!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
First Sword, Roland's Gala! 
Haaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Believe
text_block_list.text:
Eh……no way……!? 
In that moment……this distance!?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
With a single swing, I will dispel any uncertainty! 
That is what it means to be a true knight! Haaaaaaaaaaa!

——And the result. Durandal was the victor. There she stood, 
proud that she had accomplished what she set out to.
choice_data_list: You didn't give up! That was awesome!
You didn't give up! That was awesome!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much, Trainer-dono. 
No——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
My King. Your words inspired me. 
The one I should offer my sword to is you.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
And now I have a request to make of you. 
A few days from now, would you accompany me?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Welcome. I had them reassemble the set 
used at the Fan Appreciation Festival.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to do this here, by all means. 
——The Accolades.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Yes. A ritual, after which I'll be your knight. 
Would you mind, Trainer-dono?

And so the two of us decided to perform the 
ritual that Durandal had always dreamed of.

——Victory, glory, joy. May you become the protector 
of all, fulfilling your duties as an Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Yes——I swear. From this day forth, I shall be your 
knight, and protect you without fail. Then——my shoulders.
I tapped the flat of my sword on Durandal's shoulder 3 times——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much, Trainer-dono. And now we are lord and retainer. 
There is no one else with a capacity such as you.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Y-you think so……? 
I'm very honored……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: ……Huh?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: No, nothing. It's just……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(Just now I felt that I really wanted to serve this person. 
I thought it was because of their "capacity" as a King……)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(Their limitless kindness, and bold decision-making. 
I thought I was drawn to that. But……)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(Maybe that's wrong. It's not just their capacity. 
This person——)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Will praise me lots!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(I've always wanted to become a knight. I thought it was because 
I admired their coolness. But maybe……it wasn't just that)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(I……wanted to be praised! By the person I 
acknowledged as King, I wanted to be praised, 
and praised, I just wanted them to say I'm amazing!)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(That's it. That's what it was…… This person will 
praise me more than anyone. For what I do. In that case——)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
My King. I'll do my best. 
I'll really do my best.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
So look forward to it! I'll really do my best. 
So when I do my best……I'll be looking forward to it!

And so, Durandal became a knight serving me. A loyal and dignified 
knight, and——now it looked like she wanted something from me.
